chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
f: nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_instr (pos (S n))
g: nat -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
g_app: forall (k i : nat) P Q, g k i (P ++ Q) = g k i P ++ g k (length P + i) Q
g_app_inv: forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\ l = g k i L /\ r = g k (length l + i) R
length_g: forall (l i : nat) P, length (g l i P) = length P
g_subcode: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, P) -> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P)
subcode_g: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) -> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ'
i: nat
k: nat
P: list (mm_instr (pos n))

Goal:
1 <= i -> i + length P <= k -> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P)

Premises:

Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ' k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ' k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) |- nat]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P0 : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P0 pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P0 (pos_nxt p0)) -> P0 p where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ' k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) |- nat]
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ~~> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s ~~> se -> Q s
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3
in_sss_step : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), fst st1 = k + length l -> one_step i st1 st2 -> sss_step one_step (k, l ++ i :: r) st1 st2
subcode_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l r : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
